content.prompt: Which of the following developments in the late 1800s and early 1900s most directly challenges the author’s argument regarding the role of Japan in Asia?

choices.label: Japanese imperial expansion into Asian territories such as Taiwan and Korea
Resistance to modernization by traditional Japanese elites
Meiji Japan’s success in developing an industrial economy
The adoption of a parliamentary political system

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
